data.event: It was opened in 1940, when the railway line was in use to Mosj√∏en.
Harran Church, also located in the village of Harran, dates back to 1874.

event.title: was created as a municipality on 1 July 1923

data.event: The parish of Harran was created as a municipality on 1 July 1923 when it was split off from the municipality of Grong.
On 1 January 1964, Harran was reunited with Grong.
